messages.subject: RE: Don't know if anyone collects Japanese Helmets...
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, Just in case someone collects Japanese Armor Helmet, there is one up for Auction here in Portland, Oregon, the Sale is on June 6, 7 and 8th at
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone,
Just in case someone collects Japanese Armor Helmet, there is one up for
Auction here in Portland, Oregon, the Sale is on June 6, 7 and 8th at
7:00pm PST (West Coast Time). You can see the info on the website at
the Auction House O'Gallerie
http://www.ogallerie.com

They call it a Rare Antique Japanese Armor Collection 33 Plate Suji
Kabuto (Helmet). They have a ton of other stuff and I would e-mail them
and see if they can send you a photo of the items, as I don't guarantee
anything that they sell. They do allow for returns if it turns out not
to be what they said it was.
http://www.ogallerie.com/cgi-bin/search.cgi
In the Search put in Japanese and you will come up with lots of items.

Kim
